data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qBc3WSDUSJUQ7kNvgHaad4i&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAy0To8nUs8JT83Cuh7BguO2jN5XY4WHYP8oLjvGv8VOg&oe=66604A37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=X4SWEXVWa-wQ7kNvgGfRlK5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC-YneHyy_aSwLWYtesuM7CcZ8Isajg64m_itdWiu-ItA&oe=666057D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3--Wwpp2Dm8Q7kNvgGX_jX4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBvzsKLYGCJ28C_jbqDTex6RRlq8SbJg1YU058N4NUVmw&oe=66605B50)
